org.jruyi.io

Interface ICodec<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the data object to be encoded/decoded
    All Superinterfaces:
    IGetDecoder<T>, IGetLimitedDecoder<T>, IGetToDstDecoder<T>, IGetToRangedDstDecoder<T>, IPrependEncoder<T>, IPrependRangedEncoder<T>, IReadDecoder<T>, IReadLimitedDecoder<T>, IReadToDstDecoder<T>, IReadToRangedDstDecoder<T>, ISetEncoder<T>, ISetRangedEncoder<T>, IWriteEncoder<T>, IWriteRangedEncoder<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCodec

    public interface ICodec<T>
extends IReadDecoder<T>, IReadLimitedDecoder<T>, IReadToDstDecoder<T>, IReadToRangedDstDecoder<T>, IGetDecoder<T>, IGetLimitedDecoder<T>, IGetToDstDecoder<T>, IGetToRangedDstDecoder<T>, IWriteEncoder<T>, IWriteRangedEncoder<T>, ISetEncoder<T>, ISetRangedEncoder<T>, IPrependEncoder<T>, IPrependRangedEncoder<T>
    A codec used to encode/decode data to/from a chain of buffer units.
    See Also:
    Codec
